description: Enterprise techniques used by Solar, ATT&CK software S1166 (v1.0)
name: Solar (S1166)

techniques.comment: [Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) can automatically exfitrate files from compromised systems.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) can Base64-encode and gzip compress C2 communications including command outputs.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) can XOR encrypt C2 communications.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) can send staged files to C2 for exfiltration.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) has the ability to delete staged files after they are uploaded to C2.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) has the ability to download and execute files.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)

[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) can create scheduled tasks named Earth and Venus, which run every 30 and 40 seconds respectively, to support C2 and exfiltration.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
[Solar](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1166) can send basic information about the infected host to C2.(Citation: ESET OilRig Campaigns Sep 2023)
